title: Harry Potter Basics
description: Test your knowledge of the Boy Who Lived!

questions.question: What house is Harry Potter sorted into at Hogwarts?
questions.explanation: Harry was sorted into Gryffindor, though the Sorting Hat considered Slytherin due to Harry's connection to Voldemort!

questions.question: Harry's best friends are Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger.
questions.explanation: Ron and Hermione are Harry's closest friends throughout the series, eventually getting married to each other!

questions.question: What is the name of Harry's owl?
questions.explanation: Hedwig is Harry's snowy owl, a gift from Hagrid for his 11th birthday!

questions.question: What platform do students use to board the Hogwarts Express?
questions.explanation: Platform 9 3/4 at King's Cross Station is accessed by walking through the barrier between platforms 9 and 10!

questions.question: Voldemort's real name is Tom Riddle.
questions.explanation: Lord Voldemort was born Tom Marvolo Riddle, which he rearranged to create 'I am Lord Voldemort'!

questions.question: What position does Harry play in Quidditch?
questions.explanation: Harry is a Seeker, tasked with catching the Golden Snitch to end the game and earn 150 points!

questions.question: Who is the headmaster of Hogwarts when Harry arrives?
questions.explanation: Albus Dumbledore is the wise headmaster who guides Harry throughout most of the series!

questions.question: Harry has a lightning bolt scar on his forehead.
questions.explanation: Harry's famous scar was left when Voldemort's killing curse backfired, marking Harry as the 'Boy Who Lived'!
